content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experience with restaurants, but I can suggest a few places in Veracruz where you can try authentic Huachinango a la Veracruzana.

- Restaurante Villa Rica: This restaurant is located in the heart of Veracruz's historic district and is one of the most popular places to try this dish.

- La Parroquia: Another popular restaurant among locals and visitors alike, La Parroquia is known for its delicious Huachinango a la Veracruzana and other traditional Veracruz dishes.

- Los Faroles: A seafood restaurant near Veracruz's malecon that offers a variety of seafood dishes, including Huachinango a la Veracruzana.

- El Portal de Mariscos: This restaurant is located near Veracruz's main plaza and serves up a variety of seafood dishes, including Huachinango a la Veracruzana.

These are just a few of the many great seafood restaurants in Veracruz where you can try this delicious dish. Keep in mind that many restaurants in Veracruz specialize in seafood dishes, so you'll have plenty of options to choose from!
